archimate:Requirement.name: ensure that logs are stored in way that it is possible to forward them to 3rd party constantly
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As security operator I must ensure that logs are stored in way that it is possible to forward them to 3rd party constantly (collection real time re-direct) or as needed from specified source and time window in commonly supported format. This to enable the Security Monitoring service to use and extend our offering with services from 3rd party vendors.
